abilityshield.name: Ability Shield
abilityshield.desc: Holder's Ability cannot be changed by any effect.

absorbbulb.name: Absorb Bulb
absorbbulb.desc: Raises holder's Sp. Atk by 1 stage if hit by a Water-type attack. Single use.

adrenalineorb.name: Adrenaline Orb
adrenalineorb.desc: Raises holder's Speed by 1 stage if it gets affected by Intimidate. Single use.

aguavberry.name: Aguav Berry
aguavberry.desc: Restores 1/3 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpD Nature. Single use.

airballoon.name: Air Balloon
airballoon.desc: Holder is immune to Ground-type attacks. Pops when holder is hit.

apicotberry.name: Apicot Berry
apicotberry.desc: Raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

aspearberry.name: Aspear Berry
aspearberry.desc: Holder is cured if it is frozen. Single use.

assaultvest.name: Assault Vest
assaultvest.desc: Holder's Sp. Def is 1.5x, but it can only select damaging moves.

auspiciousarmor.name: Auspicious Armor
auspiciousarmor.desc: Evolves Charcadet into Armarouge when used.

babiriberry.name: Babiri Berry
babiriberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Steel-type attack. Single use.

beastball.name: Beast Ball
beastball.desc: A special Poke Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts.

bignugget.name: Big Nugget
bignugget.desc: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam.

bigroot.name: Big Root
bigroot.desc: Holder gains 1.3x HP from draining/Aqua Ring/Ingrain/Leech Seed/Strength Sap.

bindingband.name: Binding Band
bindingband.desc: Holder's partial-trapping moves deal 1/6 max HP per turn instead of 1/8.

blacksludge.name: Black Sludge
blacksludge.desc: Each turn, if holder is a Poison type, restores 1/16 max HP; loses 1/8 if not.

blunderpolicy.name: Blunder Policy
blunderpolicy.desc: If the holder misses due to accuracy, its Speed is raised by 2 stages. Single use.

boosterenergy.name: Booster Energy
boosterenergy.desc: Activates the Protosynthesis or Quark Drive Abilities. Single use.

bottlecap.name: Bottle Cap
bottlecap.desc: Used for Hyper Training. One of a Pokemon's stats is calculated with an IV of 31.

brightpowder.name: Bright Powder
brightpowder.desc: The accuracy of attacks against the holder is 0.9x.

cellbattery.name: Cell Battery
cellbattery.desc: Raises holder's Attack by 1 if hit by an Electric-type attack. Single use.

chartiberry.name: Charti Berry
chartiberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Rock-type attack. Single use.

cheriberry.name: Cheri Berry
cheriberry.desc: Holder cures itself if it is paralyzed. Single use.

chestoberry.name: Chesto Berry
chestoberry.desc: Holder wakes up if it is asleep. Single use.

chilanberry.name: Chilan Berry
chilanberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a Normal-type attack. Single use.

chippedpot.name: Chipped Pot
chippedpot.desc: Evolves Sinistea-Antique into Polteageist-Antique when used.

choiceband.name: Choice Band
choiceband.desc: Holder's Attack is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.

choicescarf.name: Choice Scarf
choicescarf.desc: Holder's Speed is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.

choicespecs.name: Choice Specs
choicespecs.desc: Holder's Sp. Atk is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.

chopleberry.name: Chople Berry
chopleberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Fighting-type attack. Single use.

clearamulet.name: Clear Amulet
clearamulet.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering the holder's stat stages.

cobaberry.name: Coba Berry
cobaberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Flying-type attack. Single use.

colburberry.name: Colbur Berry
colburberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Dark-type attack. Single use.

cornerstonemask.name: Cornerstone Mask
cornerstonemask.desc: Ogerpon-Cornerstone: 1.2x power attacks; Terastallize to gain Embody Aspect.

covertcloak.name: Covert Cloak
covertcloak.desc: Holder is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

crackedpot.name: Cracked Pot
crackedpot.desc: Evolves Sinistea into Polteageist when used.

damprock.name: Damp Rock
damprock.desc: Holder's use of Rain Dance lasts 8 turns instead of 5.

dawnstone.name: Dawn Stone
dawnstone.desc: Evolves male Kirlia into Gallade and female Snorunt into Froslass when used.
dawnstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

destinyknot.name: Destiny Knot
destinyknot.desc: If holder becomes infatuated, the other Pokemon also becomes infatuated.

diveball.name: Dive Ball
diveball.desc: A Poke Ball that works especially well on Pokemon that live underwater.

dreamball.name: Dream Ball
dreamball.desc: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pok√©mon while they're asleep.

duskball.name: Dusk Ball
duskball.desc: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokemon at night or in caves.

duskstone.name: Dusk Stone
duskstone.desc: Evolves Murkrow into Honchkrow, Misdreavus into Mismagius, Lampent into Chandelure, and Doublade into Aegislash when used.
duskstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

ejectbutton.name: Eject Button
ejectbutton.desc: If holder survives a hit, it immediately switches out to a chosen ally. Single use.

ejectpack.name: Eject Pack
ejectpack.desc: If the holder's stat stages are lowered, it switches to a chosen ally. Single use.

electricseed.name: Electric Seed
electricseed.desc: If the terrain is Electric Terrain, raises holder's Defense by 1 stage. Single use.

eviolite.name: Eviolite
eviolite.desc: If holder's species can evolve, its Defense and Sp. Def are 1.5x.

expertbelt.name: Expert Belt
expertbelt.desc: Holder's attacks that are super effective against the target do 1.2x damage.

fastball.name: Fast Ball
fastball.desc: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon which are quick to run away.

figyberry.name: Figy Berry
figyberry.desc: Restores 1/3 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -Atk Nature. Single use.

firestone.name: Fire Stone
firestone.desc: Evolves Vulpix into Ninetales, Growlithe into Arcanine, Eevee into Flareon, and Pansear into Simisear when used.
firestone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

flameorb.name: Flame Orb
flameorb.desc: At the end of every turn, this item attempts to burn the holder.

focusband.name: Focus Band
focusband.desc: Holder has a 10% chance to survive an attack that would KO it with 1 HP.

focussash.name: Focus Sash
focussash.desc: If holder's HP is full, will survive an attack that would KO it with 1 HP. Single use.

friendball.name: Friend Ball
friendball.desc: A Poke Ball that makes caught Pokemon more friendly.

ganlonberry.name: Ganlon Berry
ganlonberry.desc: Raises holder's Defense by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

goldbottlecap.name: Gold Bottle Cap
goldbottlecap.desc: Used for Hyper Training. All of a Pokemon's stats are calculated with an IV of 31.

grassyseed.name: Grassy Seed
grassyseed.desc: If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, raises holder's Defense by 1 stage. Single use.

greatball.name: Great Ball
greatball.desc: A high-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a Poke Ball.

grepaberry.name: Grepa Berry
grepaberry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.

gripclaw.name: Grip Claw
gripclaw.desc: Holder's partial-trapping moves always last 7 turns.

habanberry.name: Haban Berry
habanberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Dragon-type attack. Single use.

healball.name: Heal Ball
healball.desc: A remedial Poke Ball that restores the caught Pokemon's HP and status problem.

hearthflamemask.name: Hearthflame Mask
hearthflamemask.desc: Ogerpon-Hearthflame: 1.2x power attacks; Terastallize to gain Embody Aspect.

heatrock.name: Heat Rock
heatrock.desc: Holder's use of Sunny Day lasts 8 turns instead of 5.

heavyball.name: Heavy Ball
heavyball.desc: A Poke Ball for catching very heavy Pokemon.

heavydutyboots.name: Heavy-Duty Boots
heavydutyboots.desc: When switching in, the holder is unaffected by hazards on its side of the field.

hondewberry.name: Hondew Berry
hondewberry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.

iapapaberry.name: Iapapa Berry
iapapaberry.desc: Restores 1/3 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -Def Nature. Single use.

icestone.name: Ice Stone
icestone.desc: Evolves Alolan Sandshrew into Alolan Sandslash, Alolan Vulpix into Alolan Ninetales, Eevee into Glaceon, and Galarian Darumaka into Galarian Darmanitan when used.
icestone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

icyrock.name: Icy Rock
icyrock.desc: Holder's use of Hail lasts 8 turns instead of 5.

ironball.name: Iron Ball
ironball.desc: Holder is grounded, Speed halved. If Flying type, takes neutral Ground damage.

kasibberry.name: Kasib Berry
kasibberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Ghost-type attack. Single use.

kebiaberry.name: Kebia Berry
kebiaberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Poison-type attack. Single use.

kelpsyberry.name: Kelpsy Berry
kelpsyberry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.

kingsrock.name: King's Rock
kingsrock.desc: Holder's attacks without a chance to make the target flinch gain a 10% chance to make the target flinch. Evolves Poliwhirl into Politoed and Slowpoke into Slowking when traded.
kingsrock.shortDesc: Holder's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.

laggingtail.name: Lagging Tail
laggingtail.desc: Holder moves last in its priority bracket.

lansatberry.name: Lansat Berry
lansatberry.desc: Holder gains the Focus Energy effect when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

leafstone.name: Leaf Stone
leafstone.desc: Evolves Gloom into Vileplume, Weepinbell into Victreebel, Exeggcute into Exeggutor or Alolan Exeggutor, Eevee into Leafeon, Nuzleaf into Shiftry, and Pansage into Simisage when used.
leafstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

leftovers.name: Leftovers
leftovers.desc: At the end of every turn, holder restores 1/16 of its max HP.

leppaberry.name: Leppa Berry
leppaberry.desc: Restores 10 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP. Single use.

levelball.name: Level Ball
levelball.desc: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are a lower level than your own.

liechiberry.name: Liechi Berry
liechiberry.desc: Raises holder's Attack by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

lifeorb.name: Life Orb
lifeorb.desc: Holder's attacks do 1.3x damage, and it loses 1/10 its max HP after the attack.

lightball.name: Light Ball
lightball.desc: If held by a Pikachu, Pikotton or Ampstar, its Sp. Atk is doubled. If held by a Pikachu or Ampstar, its Attack is also doubled.

lightclay.name: Light Clay
lightclay.desc: Holder's use of Aurora Veil, Light Screen, or Reflect lasts 8 turns instead of 5.

loadeddice.name: Loaded Dice
loadeddice.desc: Holder's moves that hit 2-5 times hit 4-5 times; Population Bomb hits 4-10 times.

loveball.name: Love Ball
loveball.desc: Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are the opposite gender of your Pokemon.

lumberry.name: Lum Berry
lumberry.desc: Holder cures itself if it has a non-volatile status or is confused. Single use.

luminousmoss.name: Luminous Moss
luminousmoss.desc: Raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage if hit by a Water-type attack. Single use.

lureball.name: Lure Ball
lureball.desc: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon hooked by a Rod when fishing.

luxuryball.name: Luxury Ball
luxuryball.desc: A comfortable Poke Ball that makes a caught wild Pokemon quickly grow friendly.

magoberry.name: Mago Berry
magoberry.desc: Restores 1/3 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -Spe Nature. Single use.

maliciousarmor.name: Malicious Armor
maliciousarmor.desc: Evolves Charcadet into Ceruledge when used.

masterball.name: Master Ball
masterball.desc: The best Ball with the ultimate performance. It will catch any wild Pokemon.

masterpieceteacup.name: Masterpiece Teacup
masterpieceteacup.desc: Evolves Poltchageist-Artisan into Sinistcha-Masterpiece when used.

mentalherb.name: Mental Herb

metalcoat.name: Metal Coat
metalcoat.desc: Holder's Steel-type attacks have 1.2x power. Evolves Onix into Steelix and Scyther into Scizor when traded.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.desc: Damage of moves used on consecutive turns is increased. Max 2x after 5 turns.

mirrorherb.name: Mirror Herb

mistyseed.name: Misty Seed
mistyseed.desc: If the terrain is Misty Terrain, raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage. Single use.

moonball.name: Moon Ball

moonstone.name: Moon Stone
moonstone.desc: Evolves Nidorina into Nidoqueen, Nidorino into Nidoking, Clefairy into Clefable, Jigglypuff into Wigglytuff, Skitty into Delcatty, and Munna into Musharna when used.
moonstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

nestball.name: Nest Ball
nestball.desc: A Poke Ball that works especially well on weaker Pokemon in the wild.

netball.name: Net Ball
netball.desc: A Poke Ball that works especially well on Water- and Bug-type Pokemon.

normalgem.name: Normal Gem
normalgem.desc: Holder's first successful Normal-type attack will have 1.5x power. Single use.

occaberry.name: Occa Berry
occaberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Fire-type attack. Single use.

oranberry.name: Oran Berry
oranberry.desc: Restores 10 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

ovalstone.name: Oval Stone
ovalstone.desc: Evolves Happiny into Chansey when held and leveled up during the day.

passhoberry.name: Passho Berry
passhoberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Water-type attack. Single use.

payapaberry.name: Payapa Berry
payapaberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Psychic-type attack. Single use.

pechaberry.name: Pecha Berry
pechaberry.desc: Holder is cured if it is poisoned. Single use.

persimberry.name: Persim Berry
persimberry.desc: Holder is cured if it is confused. Single use.

petayaberry.name: Petaya Berry
petayaberry.desc: Raises holder's Sp. Atk by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

pokeball.name: Poke Ball
pokeball.desc: A device for catching wild Pokemon. It is designed as a capsule system.

pomegberry.name: Pomeg Berry
pomegberry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.

poweranklet.name: Power Anklet
poweranklet.desc: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.

powerband.name: Power Band
powerband.desc: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.

powerbelt.name: Power Belt
powerbelt.desc: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.

powerbracer.name: Power Bracer
powerbracer.desc: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.

powerherb.name: Power Herb
powerherb.desc: Holder's two-turn moves complete in one turn (except Sky Drop). Single use.

powerlens.name: Power Lens
powerlens.desc: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.

powerweight.name: Power Weight
powerweight.desc: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.

premierball.name: Premier Ball
premierball.desc: A rare Poke Ball that has been crafted to commemorate an event.

protectivepads.name: Protective Pads
protectivepads.desc: Holder's moves are protected from adverse contact effects, except Pickpocket.

psychicseed.name: Psychic Seed
psychicseed.desc: If the terrain is Psychic Terrain, raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage. Single use.

punchingglove.name: Punching Glove
punchingglove.desc: Holder's punch-based attacks have 1.1x power and do not make contact.

qualotberry.name: Qualot Berry
qualotberry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.

quickball.name: Quick Ball
quickball.desc: A Poke Ball that provides a better catch rate at the start of a wild encounter.

quickclaw.name: Quick Claw
quickclaw.desc: Each turn, holder has a 20% chance to move first in its priority bracket.

rarebone.name: Rare Bone
rarebone.desc: No competitive use other than when used with Fling.

rawstberry.name: Rawst Berry
rawstberry.desc: Holder is cured if it is burned. Single use.

razorclaw.name: Razor Claw
razorclaw.desc: Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage. Evolves Sneasel into Weavile when held and leveled up during the night.
razorclaw.shortDesc: Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

redcard.name: Red Card
redcard.desc: If holder survives a hit, attacker is forced to switch to a random ally. Single use.

repeatball.name: Repeat Ball
repeatball.desc: A Poke Ball that works well on Pokemon species that were previously caught.

rindoberry.name: Rindo Berry
rindoberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Grass-type attack. Single use.

ringtarget.name: Ring Target
ringtarget.desc: The holder's type immunities granted solely by its typing are negated.

rockyhelmet.name: Rocky Helmet
rockyhelmet.desc: If holder is hit by a contact move, the attacker loses 1/6 of its max HP.

roomservice.name: Room Service
roomservice.desc: If Trick Room is active, the holder's Speed is lowered by 1 stage. Single use.

roseliberry.name: Roseli Berry
roseliberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Fairy-type attack. Single use.

safetygoggles.name: Safety Goggles
safetygoggles.desc: Holder is immune to powder moves and damage from Sandstorm or Hail.

salacberry.name: Salac Berry
salacberry.desc: Raises holder's Speed by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

scopelens.name: Scope Lens
scopelens.desc: Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

shedshell.name: Shed Shell
shedshell.desc: Holder may switch out even when trapped by another Pokemon, or by Ingrain.

shellbell.name: Shell Bell
shellbell.desc: After an attack, holder gains 1/8 of the damage in HP dealt to other Pokemon.

shinystone.name: Shiny Stone

shinystone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

shucaberry.name: Shuca Berry
shucaberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Ground-type attack. Single use.

sitrusberry.name: Sitrus Berry
sitrusberry.desc: Restores 1/4 max HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

smoothrock.name: Smooth Rock
smoothrock.desc: Holder's use of Sandstorm lasts 8 turns instead of 5.

snowball.name: Snowball
snowball.desc: Raises holder's Attack by 1 if hit by an Ice-type attack. Single use.

starfberry.name: Starf Berry
starfberry.desc: Raises a random stat by 2 when at 1/4 max HP or less (not acc/eva). Single use.

stickybarb.name: Sticky Barb
stickybarb.desc: Each turn, holder loses 1/8 max HP. An attacker making contact can receive it.

sunstone.name: Sun Stone
sunstone.desc: Evolves Gloom into Bellossom, Sunkern into Sunflora, Cottonee into Whimsicott, Petilil into Lilligant, and Helioptile into Heliolisk when used.
sunstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

sweetapple.name: Sweet Apple
sweetapple.desc: Evolves Applin into Appletun when used.

tamatoberry.name: Tamato Berry
tamatoberry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.

tangaberry.name: Tanga Berry
tangaberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Bug-type attack. Single use.

tartapple.name: Tart Apple
tartapple.desc: Evolves Applin into Flapple when used.

terrainextender.name: Terrain Extender
terrainextender.desc: Holder's use of Electric/Grassy/Misty/Psychic Terrain lasts 8 turns instead of 5.

throatspray.name: Throat Spray
throatspray.desc: Raises holder's Special Attack by 1 stage after it uses a sound move. Single use.

thunderstone.name: Thunder Stone
thunderstone.desc: Evolves Pikachu into Raichu or Alolan Raichu, Eevee into Jolteon, Eelektrik into Eelektross, and Charjabug into Vikavolt when used.
thunderstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

timerball.name: Timer Ball
timerball.desc: A Poke Ball that becomes better the more turns there are in a battle.

toxicorb.name: Toxic Orb
toxicorb.desc: At the end of every turn, this item attempts to badly poison the holder.

ultraball.name: Ultra Ball
ultraball.desc: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

unremarkableteacup.name: Unremarkable Teacup
unremarkableteacup.desc: Evolves Poltchageist into Sinistcha when used.

utilityumbrella.name: Utility Umbrella
utilityumbrella.desc: The holder ignores rain- and sun-based effects. Damage and accuracy calculations from attacks used by the holder are affected by rain and sun, but not attacks used against the holder.
utilityumbrella.shortDesc: The holder ignores rain- and sun-based effects.

wacanberry.name: Wacan Berry
wacanberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Electric-type attack. Single use.

waterstone.name: Water Stone
waterstone.desc: Evolves Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, Shellder into Cloyster, Staryu into Starmie, Eevee into Vaporeon, Lombre into Ludicolo, and Panpour into Simipour when used.
waterstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.

weaknesspolicy.name: Weakness Policy
weaknesspolicy.desc: If holder is hit super effectively, raises Attack, Sp. Atk by 2 stages. Single use.

wellspringmask.name: Wellspring Mask
wellspringmask.desc: Ogerpon-Wellspring: 1.2x power attacks; Terastallize to gain Embody Aspect.

whiteherb.name: White Herb
whiteherb.desc: Restores all lowered stat stages to 0 when one is less than 0. Single use.

widelens.name: Wide Lens
widelens.desc: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.1x.

wikiberry.name: Wiki Berry
wikiberry.desc: Restores 1/3 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpA Nature. Single use.

yacheberry.name: Yache Berry
yacheberry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Ice-type attack. Single use.

zoomlens.name: Zoom Lens
zoomlens.desc: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.2x if it moves after its target.
